titles.title: National Beach Recreation and Economic Benefits Act
A bill to ensure that recreational benefits are given the same priority as hurricane and storm damage reduction benefits and environmental restoration benefits.
National Beach Recreation and Economic Benefits Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: National Beach Recreation and Economic Benefits Act - Requires the Secretary of the Army, in making recommendations regarding shore protection projects, to establish procedures for the determination of national economic benefits that treat benefits for recreation equally to benefits for hurricane and storm damage reduction and environmental restoration.
